text: William "Bill" Harrell (July 18, 1928 - May 6, 2014) was an American sportsman. He played basketball for the Siena Saints. He was best known for his time in the Major League Baseball and played in the league between 1955 and 1961. During his time in the MLB, he played for the Cleveland Indians in 1955 and from 1957 until 1958 and Boston Red Sox in 1961. He was born in Norristown, Pennsylvania. Harrell died on May 6, 2014 at his home in Albany, New York. He was 85. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:African-American basketball players Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania Category:American basketball players
title: Billy Harrell
